<js>

//è®¿é—®èµ·ç‚¹
if (/^[^â‘¤â‘¥è¯„å•â–³å£¹è´°]$/.test(bj)) {

	let tm=100; //æœ€ä½å»¶æ—¶
	if (!re) {
	let url=QDSign("v3/bookdetail/get", ["bookId="+bkid,"isOutBook=0"]);
	re = java.ajax(url);
	//é˜²æ­¢è®¿é—®é¢‘ç¹
	let ppage=cache.getFromMemory('zsfxpage')||1;
	tm = ppage<7 ? ppage*100 : 10;
	cache.putMemory('zs'+bkid,re);}
	Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(tm); //é˜²æ­¢è¿‡å¿«å“åº”å¯¼è‡´pageå˜åŒ–æ²¡è·Ÿä¸Šï¼ˆä»æœ‰æä½æ¦‚ç‡ï¼‰
	}

if (bj=='â‘ '||bj=='â‘¡') {

else if (/^[â‘¢â‘£â‘¥â‘¦]$/.test(bj)) {

else if (/^[â…£â…¤]$/.test(bj)) {
	result = gets('td.4@a.0@text');
	}
else if (/^[â…«]$/.test(bj)) {
	result = gets('td.5@a.0@text');
	}
else if (/^[å„„]$/.test(bj)) {
	result = gets('td.2@a.0@text');
	}
else if (/^[è¯„å•â–³å£¹è´°]$/.test(bj)) {
	result=gets('$.AuthorName||BookAuthor||Author');
	}

if(source.get('zzs')==1) result='\u200b'+result;
result

else if (yxj!=1) {

if (!rr) {

	let zustime3 = cache.getFromMemory('zustime');

zustime3+=300;

	Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(300);}

//æœ€æ–°æ—¶é—´å…è´¹

//æœ€æ–°æ—¶é—´vip

//é‡‡ç”¨æœ€æ–°çš„
if (lct2>lct) lct=lct2;
let bklst = java.get('bklst');

//å¼€å§‹åˆ†é€»è¾‘
if (bklst==lct && bklsr!='') {

	} else {
	//åŸé€»è¾‘

let url1=QDSign("v3/chapterlist/chapterlist",["bookId="+bkid,"timeStamp=0","requestSource=0","md5Signature=","extendchapterIds="]);
result = java.ajax(url1);

zustime+=300;
cache.putMemory('zustime',zustime);
while(Date.now()<zustime) {
	Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(300);}
java.setContent(result);
let rr1=java.getElement('$.*.Chapters[*]');
rr1=Array.from(rr1);
let rr0 = rr1.shift();
let rr2=java.getElement('$.*.Volumes[*]');

for (let char of rr2) {
let ind = rr1.findIndex(x => x.Vc == char.VolumeCode);
char.C=char.VolumeCode;
rr1.splice(ind,0,char);	
	}
book.putVariable('cdw',JSON.stringify(rr1));

//è·å–å½©è›‹ç« 
let url2=QDSign("v1/midpage/book/chapters",["bookId="+bkid]);
	result = java.ajax(url2);
	java.setContent(result);
	let rr3=java.getElement('$.*.Chapters[*]');
for (let char of rr3) {
	let cidc = char.ChapterId;
	let ind = rr1.findIndex(x => x.C == cidc);
	char.C='å½©'+cidc;
	char.T=char.MidpageList[0].UpdateTime;
	if (ind>0) rr1.splice(ind+1,0,char); //æ²¡æ‰¾åˆ°çš„è¡¨ç¤ºå·²åˆ é™¤
	}

//å®šä½
let ind = rr1.findIndex(x => x.Vc == 200);
if (!book.durChapterIndex) book.durChapterIndex=ind;
rr1.unshift(rr0);

result=rr1.map(x=>{
if ('T' in x) x.T=java.timeFormat(x.T);
return x});
book.putVariable('bkmlr',JSON.stringify(result));
book.putVariable('bklst',lct);
//åŸé€»è¾‘ç»“æŸ
}

//æœˆç¥¨æ£€æµ‹
let yp = source.get('qdzsyp');
if (yp=='1'&&book.group!=0) {
	//è·å–æ´»åŠ¨
let url3=QDSign("v1/fund/activitylistdetail",["bookId=" + bkid,"pg=1","pz=20"]);

} else {
	//ä¸‹æ¶ä¹¦

result.map(x=>{
